overview:
Responsible for technical oversight of the GuestLogix Mobile Virtual Store platform, which provides Point Of Sale functionality on commercial airliners, passenger rail, and seagoing ferries. Rising fuel prices are driving the transportation industry to seek new revenue streams in lieu of raising fares. GuestLogix provides a full-cycle solution allowing customers to tap these streams.

Steve drives both the distributed high-availability infrastructure and the high-level infrastructure required to co-ordinate transactions from thousands of mobile devices in use by some of the world’s largest airlines.
